original_text: I am sending this man to you. The Jews took hold of him and they wanted to kill him. I found out that he is a citizen of Rome. Because of that, I took my soldiers and I saved him from them.
korean_text: 이 사람이 유대인들에게 잡혀 죽게 된 것을 내가 로마 사람인 줄 들어 알고 군대를 거느리고 가서 구원하여다가

sentences.original_text: I am sending this man to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 사람을 당신에게 보내고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: The Jews took hold of him
and they wanted to kill him
that he is a citizen of Rome
and I saved him from them
